Class MediaCollection

java.lang.Object
org.Code.MediaCollection
public class MediaCollection extends Object
Represents a collection of Media items in the library system.

This class allows adding media items (such as books or CDs) and searching for an item by its title. The search is case-insensitive and returns the first matching item.

Typical usage: 

     MediaCollection collection = new MediaCollection();
     collection.addItem(new Book("Clean Code", "Robert Martin", "111", false));
     Media item = collection.searchItem("clean code");

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public void addItem(Media item)
      Adds a media item (Book, CD, etc.) to the collection.
      Parameters:
      item - the media item to add; must not be null

    • searchItem

      public Media searchItem(String name)
      Searches the collection for a media item with a matching title.

      The comparison is case-insensitive and returns the first match found. If no item matches the provided name, null is returned.

      Parameters:
      name - the title of the media item to search for
      Returns:
      the matching Media item, or null if none found
